content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of coal, which has now updated my inventory to:
# - 10 coal
# - 10 iron ore
# - 5 stone
# - 1 iron plate
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# With the coal now available, I can proceed to fuel the new stone furnace for smelting. 
# I will insert 5 coal and 5 iron ore into the furnace to start the smelting process.

insert_item(Prototype.Coal, new_furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert coal for fuel
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, new_furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert iron ore into the furnace for smelting

# Let’s check the status of the new furnace to ensure it is processing correctly.
print(f"New Furnace status after adding resources: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the contents of the new furnace
print(f"Updated Inventory after adding resources: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after adding resources
